hero.title: About LocusStay
hero.subtitle: Your Locus in a World of Possibilities. Be the center point in a world full of infinite possibilities.

story.title: It All Begins with Our Name: LocusStay
story.subtitle: Our name is our philosophy
story.paragraph1: Our name is our philosophy. "Locus," in Latin, means "place" or "center point." "Stay" represents the hospitality industry we are deeply rooted in. LocusStay was founded to provide every hotel worldwide with its absolute center in the digital marketing landscape.
story.paragraph2: We are a technology company headquartered in the UK. We understand that in this rapidly changing global market, stability and reliability are crucial. Just as our geographical location serves as a hub connecting the world, our technology platform is committed to becoming your solid hub for connecting with global travelers.
story.paragraph3: We have witnessed too many excellent hotels miss opportunities due to technological barriers. Therefore, we have brought together senior experts from the hotel industry and top technology architects, determined to create a powerful yet intuitive platform that allows you to start from one center point, precisely control the overall situation, and easily handle challenges.

mission.title: Our Mission & Philosophy
mission.statement: Through leading intelligent distribution technology, help every hotel worldwide find its optimal positioning in the market, easily connect with the world, and maximize revenue and brand value.

success.title: Partner Success is Our Success
success.description: We are committed to being your "success partner," ensuring that you not only use the platform but also use it to achieve your business goals.

innovation.title: Innovation with Purpose
innovation.description: Every feature we introduce must directly serve a clear purpose: improve your efficiency, increase revenue, or enhance customer experience.

transparency.title: Radical Transparency
transparency.description: Trust is built on openness and honesty. Our pricing models and data reports are clear and direct, with no hidden terms.

technology.title: Our Technology Core
technology.subtitle: We transform the industry's most complex technology into the simplest operations at your fingertips.

engine.title: Intelligent Revenue Engine
engine.description: Our AI engine is your brain, continuously analyzing market data to provide precise navigation for your pricing strategy.

platform.title: The Unified Locus
platform.description: This is your command center. Manage all channel rates, inventory, and bookings on one dashboard. All commands are issued from here, all information converges here, goodbye to chaos, eliminate overbooking.

api.title: API-First Architecture
api.description: Our platform has powerful connectivity, capable of seamlessly integrating with your existing PMS and other systems, ensuring your technology stack truly works as one.

impact.title: Numbers Tell Our Story
impact.subtitle: Starting from our UK headquarters, our influence has reached globally. LocusStay is creating measurable value for thousands of hotel partners worldwide.

hotels.label: Partner Hotels
hotels.description: From boutique design hotels to urban business hotels, our partners span the globe.

countries.label: Countries Served
countries.description: Our service network covers six continents, truly achieving global connectivity.

revenue.label: Average Revenue Increase
revenue.description: Through our intelligent pricing and channel optimization, partners achieve an average 25% increase in online revenue.

uptime.label: System Uptime
uptime.description: We promise to provide enterprise-level stability and reliability, safeguarding your business.

future.title: Defining Next-Generation Hotel Distribution Ecosystem
future.subtitle: We believe connecting distribution channels is just the first step. The future of hospitality lies in personalized, sustainable, and seamlessly integrated customer experiences.
future.description: Our technology blueprint always looks to the future, committed to upgrading LocusStay from a distribution center to a business intelligence center. We are actively exploring:

personalization.title: Hyper-Personalized Marketing
personalization.description: Help hotels provide personalized services tailored to each guest.

sustainability.title: Sustainability Tools
sustainability.description: Help hotels optimize resources to meet the needs of the new generation of travelers.

ecosystem.title: Fully Open Ecosystem
ecosystem.description: Create a "super technology stack" that can be selected on-demand and plug-and-play.

future.conclusion: We are not just building a platform; we are investing in the future of hospitality. We are committed to ensuring our partners always stay at the forefront of industry transformation.

hero.title: Revolutionizing Global Hotel Distribution
hero.subtitle: Connect with hotel partners across 180+ countries and regions through cutting-edge technology, data insights, and an unparalleled global network. Transform how hotels connect with travelers and usher in a new era of hospitality distribution.

benefits.title: Core Competitive Advantages
benefits.subtitle: Providing cutting-edge technology-driven distribution solutions for the global hospitality industry, empowering business growth and digital transformation

benefit1.title: Omnichannel Coverage
benefit1.description: Integrate 150+ global distribution channels with unified inventory management to maximize exposure and booking conversion rates.

benefit2.title: Revenue Intelligence
benefit2.description: AI-powered dynamic pricing strategies that analyze market data in real-time to optimize revenue management decisions.

benefit3.title: Smart Automation
benefit3.description: Fully automated operational processes that reduce manual intervention by 90%, enhancing efficiency and accuracy.

benefit4.title: Dedicated Partnership
benefit4.description: 24/7 professional support team providing personalized solutions and technical guidance.

map.title: Global Service Network
map.subtitle: Our distribution network spans the globe, providing hotel partners with borderless market access capabilities

regions.northAmerica: North America - 45 major cities, connecting premium OTA platforms and corporate clients
regions.europe: Europe - 52 city coverage, deep integration with local booking ecosystems
regions.asiaPacific: Asia Pacific - 38 strategic nodes, focusing on mobile booking experience optimization
regions.middleEast: Middle East - 18 core markets, providing multilingual localization services
regions.latinAmerica: Latin America - 27 emerging markets, exploring high-growth potential regions

testimonials.title: Customer Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from our partners about how they achieved business growth through our platform. Their success is our best proof.

contact.title: Ready to Begin Your Business Growth Journey?
contact.subtitle: We are eager to discuss how to tailor the optimal distribution strategy for your hotel. Contact our expert team through the following channels, and let us create success together.
contact.ctaTitle: Start Your Digital Transformation Journey Today
contact.ctaSubtitle: Join 5,000+ successful hotels and let us redefine your distribution strategy together
contact.ctaNote: * We commit to responding to your inquiry within 24 hours with professional solution recommendations

footer.companyDescription: Global leading hotel distribution technology platform, providing intelligent distribution solutions for the hospitality industry.
